details.returns:
Returns

If you’ve changed your mind about keeping your purchase, please return it in its original condition with proof of purchase and we’ll exchange or refund it. Unless faulty, this should be within 35 days of receiving your order. By original condition, we’d expect this to mean that you’ve kept packaging and labels, and that the item is undamaged and unused.

You can return for free in the UK via John Lewis and Waitrose Shops, Royal Mail, Collect+ or MyHermes. If you need to arrange collection of large or heavy items, call us on 03456 049 049. For international returns queries, call us on +44 1698 545 454

You’ll find returns information on your delivery note. Exceptions apply to certain products - find out more about our refund policy
details.returnsHeadline:
Returns -

See more details
details.productInformation:
Boasting plenty of convenient features within a simple-to-use design, the SMS24AW01G Freestanding Dishwasher from Bosch is sure to be a welcome helping hand in any kitchen.

dosageAssist
This useful feature makes sure your detergent is completely dissolved for a more effective wash by releasing it into a special tray on top of the basket and mixing it into the cycle.

ecoSilence
Bosch's revolutionary brushless motor has been developed to achieve maximum power with minimum energy loss. It's now quieter, faster, more energy efficient, durable and powerful.

Flexible loading
The SMS24AW01G offers total flexibility with its varioBasket system. The top basket can be adjusted between 3 height positions and both top and bottom drawers contain plenty of racking and 2 foldable cup shelves each.

Additional features:

  • Internal water protection
  • Glass protection
  • Self-cleaning filter
  • Eco 50°C programme
  • Quick 45 °C wash

attributes.name: Noise Level
attributes.toolTip: How noisy, in decibels, the machine is. The lower the dB, the quieter the appliance. A human voice in normal conversation is approximately 60dB, while an alarm clock might be 80dB

attributes.name: Time remaining indicator
attributes.toolTip: Tells you how long the programme's got to go before completion

attributes.name: Adjustable racking
attributes.toolTip: Indicates whether you can move the racking around. This helps to fit large or awkwardly shaped items

attributes.name: Delicate Wash
attributes.toolTip: This cycle uses a lesser degree of agitation and the spin cycle uses a slow spin to extract water from your laundry. This provides an effective but overall gentler wash, ideal for delicate items

attributes.name: Program Sequence Indicator
attributes.toolTip: Tells you the progress of your washing/drying cycle

attributes.name: Cycle duration at rated capacity for the eco cycle
Overflow protection
attributes.toolTip: An anti-flood device prevents the machine from being damaged by flooding from the inlet pipe

attributes.name: Drying performance
attributes.toolTip: Graded on performance A - G, with A being the highest grade

attributes.name: Automatic Load Adjustment
attributes.toolTip: Automatically adjusts water level for a smaller load, thus saving time and money

attributes.name: Weighted Water Consumption for the Eco cycle
Slim depth
attributes.toolTip: A freestanding appliance approximately 55cm or less in depth

attributes.name: Online Exclusive
attributes.toolTip: This product is not available in John Lewis branches

attributes.name: Place Settings
attributes.toolTip: A complete set of items provided for one person at a meal

attributes.name: Quick wash
attributes.toolTip: Speedy programme when you need items cleaned quickly

attributes.name: Weighted Energy Consumption per 100 cycles for Eco cycle

details.editorsNotes:
By your side – today, tomorrow and in the future. Bosch’s home appliances.
Bosch can't simply cancel your daily routines for you. But they can shorten them for you. As Europe's number one home appliance brand, they always offer absolute peak performance to make your everyday life easier. Their home appliances represent uncompromising quality, technical perfection and absolute reliability. Yesterday, today and in the future.

Robert Bosch's first workshop lays the foundations for Bosch Home Appliances.
With the establishment of his workshop for precision engineering and electrical engineering, Robert Bosch lays the foundations in Stuttgart for Bosch’s success story. For him, the thought of not producing the very best at all times was intolerable. Robert Bosch always acted on the principle that honest workmanship is more important than temporary gain. This is why, for nearly 130 years, Bosch’s products have stood for uncompromising quality, technical perfection and absolute reliability.

optionalServices.title: Dishwasher Installation
optionalServices.description:
What this includes

  • Disconnection of your old appliance
  • Connection to an unobstructed 13amp, 3 pin electrical socket and waste outlet (if required) within 1 metre
  • Electrical circuit test, machine test and demonstration of basic controls
  • Removal of all packaging

What you should know

  • We can't connect to hardwired sockets, only 3 pin electrical sockets
  • If going under a worktop, make sure there's enough clearance (87cm from floor to underside)
  • If going from integrated to freestanding, please remove the plinth and the decor door before our team's arrival
  • We won't install in a bath/shower room, or in an unheated outbuilding such as a detached garage
  • We'll give you transit bolts if you need to move the appliance to another property

optionalServices.title: Dishwasher Recycling
optionalServices.description:
Our recycling service includes the taking away of your old appliance & packaging. The materials will be reused or recycled to create less waste & impact on the environment.

Please drain/remove the contents of your old appliance and safely disconnect from the water/electricity supply.

If you've booked an installation and recycling service, we'll take your old appliance away from the room.

details.productInformation:
The Bosch SMV40C30GB built-in dishwasher features a range of programmes to choose from. The 12 place settings make it suitable for a family household, and a durable Polinox base will give it a long life.

4 programmes
4 programmes to choose from allow you to easily wash your dishes with the most appropriate settings. These programmes include a quick wash programme which is ideal for when you need your dishes clean in a hurry.

Water efficient
On a normal 65°C programme, the dishwasher will use just 11.8 litres of water. The AquaSensor measures the amount of soiling at the end of the pre-rinse. If the water is only lightly soiled, it will be re-used for the main wash.

Quiet
At just 50dB, the SMV40C30GB has a low noise level, so once you’ve put your dishes in the wash you can enjoy the rest of your evening in peace. The lack of annoying background noise is especially handy if you’re entertaining guests.

VarioBaskets
With VarioBaskets, you can enjoy a flexible storage space which can be customised to fit your kitchen items inside efficiently. This is handy for washing particularly large items.

InfoLight
The InfoLight feature lets you know when the dishwasher is in use by projecting a dot of light onto the floor. This will prevent you from accidentally opening the door mid-cycle.

VarioSpeed
Sometimes you need a fast wash but without any compromises in quality. VarioSpeed technology lets you cut programme times in half while getting excellent cleaning and drying results.

Please drain/remove the contents of your old appliance and safely disconnect from the water/electricity supply.

optionalServices.title: Integrated Dishwasher Installation
optionalServices.description:
What this includes

  • Disconnection of your old appliance
  • Connection of the appliance to an existing water connection point that is within 1 metre of installation location
  • Connection of the appliance to an existing 3 pin 13 amp plug socket or hard-wired electricity point that is within 1 metre of installation location.
  • Connection of the appliance to an existing waste outlet that is within 1 metre of the installation location
  • Test wash to ensure that the appliance fills and drains correctly
  • Refitting of the decorative door(s)
  • Removal of all packaging

Returns -

details.productInformation:
If you’re lacking kitchen space but want an easy alternative to washing up, look no further than this Bosch slimline dishwasher. Still with all the same features of larger models (including smart connectivity), it's clever technology ensures you'll wash with energy and water efficiency no matter what programme you choose.

Home Connect
Push notifications can be sent from your dishwasher directly to your mobile device, conveniently letting you know the current program status of your dishwasher, even tracking your usage and consumption- informing you when you’re down to your last five dishwasher tablets.

5 automatic programmes
You’ll always get the best cleaning performance by just selecting the right programme. Water usage, water temperature and rinse time are adjusted exactly to suit the level of soiling, providing you with the best results while saving water and energy.

Glass protection
Because soft water causes glass corrosion, this dishwasher has AquaMix glass protection technology that constantly regulates the degree of hardness. This ensures that valuable glasses and delicate china are always washed with special care.

ExtraDry
Bosch's ExtraDry option increases drying time and temperatures to enhance drying performance for a sparkling shine. No more streaky glasses or drippy leftover boxes, and you can throw that ragged tea towel away and all.

Heat Exchanger
This feature pre-heats the water in the rinsing tank to avoid any temperature shocks. This always ensures the right temperature for optimal dish care, treating precious glasses and porcelain with particular care.

AquaStop
The AquaStop system consists of a double-walled supply hose, a safety valve, as well as a floor sump with float switch, offering 100% protection against water damage.

EcoSilence Drive
Bosch’s revolutionary EcoSilence Drive™ motor is quieter, more powerful and energy-efficient than ever before. The brushless technology prevents friction so the motor is more durable, energy-efficient and quiet. Perfect for open plan living.

attributes.toolTip: How noisy, in decibels, the machine is. The lower the dB, the quieter the appliance. A human voice in normal conversation is approximately 60dB, while an alarm clock might be 80dB

attributes.name: Amperage
attributes.toolTip: The maximum current in amperes the switch will carry continuously. Please consult a qualified electrician for power supply wiring requirements and to see if this product is compatible with your home.

attributes.name: Inverter Motor
attributes.toolTip: Inverter motors have fewer parts, making them extremely quiet - perfect for open-plan living

attributes.name: Weighted Water Consumption for the Eco cycle
Slim depth

attributes.name: Average annual energy cost
attributes.toolTip: An estimate of how much the appliance costs to run a year (assuming 1kwh = 10p inc VAT). Please contact your electricity supplier for the price you would actually pay for a unit of electricity

attributes.name: Place Settings
attributes.toolTip: A complete set of items provided for one person at a meal
